articles.title: 'AI should start from youth': Zimbabwe Ambassador to India lauds PM Modi's vision
articles.description: Zimbabwe's Ambassador Stella Nkomo praised PM Modi's address at the India AI Impact Summit 2026, saying it aligns perfectly with her country's goals: youth-led innovation and making AI accessible to all as a strategic tool for progress.
articles.content: New Delhi [India], February 19 (ANI): Stella Nkomo, Ambassador of Zimbabwe to India, praised Prime Minister Narendra Modi's address at the India AI Impact Summit 2026, noting that his vision for technological inclusivity and youth-led innovation clos... [2149 chars]
